Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are still running with significant delays near Belmont due to a stalled train.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are still running with delays near Belmont due to a stalled train.

Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Belmont to Kimball in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include these bus routes:

  • #77 Belmont
  • #22 Clark
  • #8 Halsted
  • #81 Lawrence
  • #80 Irving Park

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
